comment: I took Professional Writing. It was challenging. I got to know the professor. She guided me to professional writing. Dr. Greene went above and beyond to support. She was always available for academic support. I enjoyed the ways instruction was articulated, elaborated, and connected with rigor, relevance, and relationship.
Too much of this class was a religious discussion. Plenty of writing though. Didn't feel like this class really helped me after having taken AP English classes in high school.

Every semester she picks a different topic for rhetoric. I had her fall 08 the topic was political rhetoric. I thought the class would be horrible, but it was actually fun. She is easy on grammer and looks more at content. She does not count off of a paper because you do not agree with her. I would recommend her class.
whole class is nothing but a religious debate. i didn't sign up for church. screw you.
